Package javax.jcr.security

Interface AccessControlPolicy

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AccessControlList, CugPolicy, JackrabbitAccessControlList, JackrabbitAccessControlPolicy, NamedAccessControlPolicy, PrincipalAccessControlList, PrincipalSetPolicy
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAccessControlList, ImmutableACL, ReadPolicy
    public interface AccessControlPolicy
    The AccessControlPolicy is a marker interface for all kind of access control policies. This API defines two subinterfaces:
    • NamedAccessControlPolicy,
    • AccessControlList.
    Since:
    JCR 2.0
